name: Starbucks Posters
description:
I miss a time when I would just order a coffee and the smell will bring me joy. When I stayed in a Starbucks and didn't leave for a while.

See, how people are passing by...

Rushing through their day...

And I am staying in headphones and hearing a beat...

I miss it...

Staying without a mask...

Not overthink twice - hugging good buy...

Helping a stranger to pick up something they dropped...

Not drawing two-meter circles around...

Missing the feeling of real glass...

Missing the warmth of the mug...

I am missing tangible things...

I am not saying, that we have to stop wearing masks.

I am saying, I miss what we had.
